CBS News reports that Dodge-Chrysler is seriously rethinking minivans as an automotive form factor, and that the company plans to completely redesign the iconic American family hauler. We need to seriously rethink the minivan, said Sergio Marchionne , CEO of Chrysler, in a recent ABC interview.`` We need to retain all its functionality but make it much more versatile. Michael Jordan jumper was deadly.'' Using mostly jump shots, Allen Iverson went 20-of-30 from the field. He also hit 10-of-13 free-throw attempts en route to his third career 50-point game and first since February 6 against Sacramento. When your jumper is on, the basket seems like an ocean and the basketball seems like a rock, he said.`` That is the way it felt tonight.`` Rafer Alston teammates are the ones that set the screens for me and got me the ball in spots where Elgin Baylor need the ball.
